title: Client won't open? (Mac)
body: I don't know why or how, but literally the client is not opening, nothing, it doesn't seem like league is executing something, I've already used the hextech repair tool and nothing, currently I'm reinstalling the game, is there an actual solution to this?

replies.body: I wonder if your Mac somehow lost the admin settings it needed for League to be able to fully load. Check out [**this section on how you can set up those administrator settings again**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq9), and let me know if that helps or not!
I just did what the link told me to do and... still nothing D:

I have multiple accounts in my mac, in my brother's account, he doesn't have admin privilege and yet he is able to play league normally, he has told me that this problem has happened to him previously but now he can play.
